game.title: The Lost Crown
game.objective: Retrieve the lost crown of the king.
game.description: The king's crown was stolen by a group of bandits. The king has offered a reward for its return.

task.objective: Find the bandits' hideout in the Eastern Forest.
task.description: The bandits are known to operate near a fork in the path.

task.objective: Defeat the bandits and retrieve the crown at their camp.
task.description: A cave is nearby where they might be hiding the crown.

task.objective: Return the crown to the king's chambers in the castle.
task.description: The guards will direct you upon arrival.
